clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Jiedu Tongluo Granules for Post-stroke Depression
clinical_study.official_title: The Efficacy and Safety of Jiedu Tongluo Granules on Patients With Post-stroke Depression: a Double-blind, Randomized and Placebo-controlled Trial

lead_sponsor.agency: Xiyuan Hospital of China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences

clinical_study.source: Xiyuan Hospital of China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences

brief_summary.textblock: To explore the efficacy and safety of Jiedu Tongluo granules for post stroke depression. A randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled clinical trial was designed. The treatment group was administered the Jiedu Tongluo granules, while the control group was administered the placebo.

primary_outcome.measure: Change of 17-item Hamilton Depression Scale( HAMD-17) From Baseline
primary_outcome.description: Depression symptoms are mainly measured by the 17-item Hamilton Depression Scale (HAMD-17)

primary_outcome.measure: Change of Barthel Index (BI) From Baseline
primary_outcome.description: The daily activities will be measured using Barthel Index(BI)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change of National Institute of Health stroke scale（NIHSS）From Baseline
secondary_outcome.description: Neurological function mainly measured by NIHSS

secondary_outcome.measure: The stroke diagnosis and evaluation criteria of Traditional Chinese Medicine（TCM）from baseline
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate patients' syndrome by TCM scale

other_outcome.measure: The change of cytokines IL-6、 IL-8 in serum from baseline
other_outcome.description: To find the inflammation factors related with post-stroke depression

arm_group.description: Patients in this group were administered the Jiedu Tongluo granules .
Patients in this group were administered the placebo .

intervention.description: Patients in this group were administered the Jiedu Tongluo granules, 3.9mg/bag, 2 times/day for 8 weeks.
Patients in this group were administered the placebo, 3.9mg/bag, 2 times/day for 8 weeks.
